mean_cn: adj. 放纵的，宽容的，任性的
mean_en: willing to allow someone to have or enjoy something even though it may not be proper, healthy, appropriate, etc.
word_etyma: indulg纵容 + ent → indulgent 纵容的
short_phrase: The indulgent parent gives his son pizza.
sentence: I'm a very indulgent parent, so I let my son eat pizza every day.
sentence_trans: 我一个是非常纵容的父母，所以我让儿子每天吃披萨。
